pullrequest.title: Add battery plugins into launch files

content.raw:
I ran the world for 2mins and the state of charge went down roughly ~10% so I think the params are ok.

I think one important thing we need to consider is when the battery starts draining. It currently starts when the simulation is started. So that means all robots will be disabled after 20min regardless of the time limit of the competition run.
content.html:
I ran the world for 2mins and the state of charge went down roughly ~10% so I think the params are ok.

I think one important thing we need to consider is when the battery starts draining. It currently starts when the simulation is started. So that means all robots will be disabled after 20min regardless of the time limit of the competition run.
